0.2.name: wordpress/lil-gallery
0.2.description: Big main picture of a gallery and thumbnails of others, and the main image changes when one clicks thumbnails. Replaces the standard wordpress [gallery] shortcode output. No flash. Available options: width, heigth, thumbnail height, size, link to image file or not.
